BUGS

Inline code for the date does not work with LaTeX. The reason is that we search for \usepackage to insert \usepackage{stata} and the date comes just before this. Need to think of another way to inject the package.

quietly blocks donâ€™t work very well because the initial quietly { is echoed by Stata. Easy to supress if you use a quiet block, but that will not always be the case. Could look for a line with just quietly {, but of course the command may be abbreviated. Current workaround is to use quietly in every line

Trying to center a table imported from the collection system has no effect because the tags open before the table but close after the style. Better to target the class, which has the table name
